q: Where is the headquarters of the Anthropological Survey of India?
desc: The Anthropological Survey of India, established in 1945, is headquartered in Kolkata.

q: In which year was the Archaeological Survey of India established?
desc: The Archaeological Survey of India was established in 1861 to oversee archaeological research and conservation.

q: Who founded the Asiatic Society in 1784?
desc: Sir William Jones founded the Asiatic Society in Kolkata in 1784.

q: Where is the headquarters of the Indira Gandhi National Centre for Arts?
desc: The Indira Gandhi National Centre for Arts, established in 1985, is based in New Delhi.

q: Which cultural institution was founded in 1954 and is known as the National Academy of Fine Arts?
desc: Lalit Kala Akademi, founded in 1954 in New Delhi, is the National Academy of Fine Arts.

q: What is the headquarters of the National Archives of India?
desc: The National Archives of India, established in 1981, is headquartered in New Delhi.

q: When was the National School of Drama established?
desc: The National School of Drama was founded in 1959 in New Delhi.

q: In which year was the Sahitya Academy established?
desc: The Sahitya Academy, which promotes literature, was established in 1954 in New Delhi.

q: Where is the Sangeet Natak Academy headquartered?
desc: The Sangeet Natak Academy, founded in 1953, is based in New Delhi.

q: Where is the Library of Tibetan Works and Archives located?
desc: The Library of Tibetan Works and Archives is located in Dharamshala, Himachal Pradesh.

q: In which city is Science City located?
desc: Science City is a prominent science museum located in Kolkata.

q: Where is the Victoria Memorial Hall located?
desc: The Victoria Memorial Hall, a museum and tourist attraction, is located in Kolkata.

q: What is the location of Birla Industrial and Tech Museum?
desc: Birla Industrial and Tech Museum is based in Kolkata.

q: Where is the Central Institute of Buddhist Studies located?
desc: The Central Institute of Buddhist Studies is located in Leh, Ladakh.

q: Where can the Nava Nalanda Mahavihara be found?
desc: The Nava Nalanda Mahavihara is located in Nalanda, Bihar.

q: Which city hosts the National Gallery of Modern Art?
desc: The National Gallery of Modern Art is headquartered in New Delhi.

q: Which academy was established in 1953?
desc: The Sangeet Natak Academy, focused on music and drama, was established in 1953.

q: Which institution was founded by Sir William Jones?
desc: Sir William Jones founded the Asiatic Society in 1784 in Kolkata.

q: Where is the Indira Gandhi National Centre for Arts located?
desc: The Indira Gandhi National Centre for Arts is based in New Delhi.

q: What is the main focus of the Sahitya Academy?
desc: The Sahitya Academy promotes Indian literature in various languages.

q: Which cultural institution is located in Dharamshala?
desc: The Library of Tibetan Works and Archives is located in Dharamshala.

q: Which museum in Kolkata is related to science and technology?
desc: Birla Industrial and Tech Museum in Kolkata focuses on science and technology.

q: Which institution was established in 1985?
pool: Indira Gandhi National Centre for Arts
answer: Indira Gandhi National Centre for Arts
desc: The Indira Gandhi National Centre for Arts was established in 1985 in New Delhi.

q: Which is the oldest cultural institution in the list?
desc: Founded in 1784, the Asiatic Society is the oldest among the listed institutions.

q: Which institution focuses on Buddhist studies and is located in Leh?
desc: The Central Institute of Buddhist Studies is located in Leh and focuses on Buddhist education.

q: What is the focus of the Lalit Kala Akademi?
desc: Lalit Kala Akademi promotes the visual arts, including painting and sculpture.

q: Which academy is referred to as the National Academy of Music, Dance and Drama?
desc: The Sangeet Natak Academy is India's national academy for music, dance and drama.

q: What is the function of the National School of Drama?
desc: The National School of Drama provides professional training in theatre and acting.

q: Which institution is located in Nalanda and linked to ancient learning?
desc: Nava Nalanda Mahavihara is a modern institution in Nalanda continuing the legacy of ancient Buddhist education.
